TextLibrary.Text: Rumor has it that Cytech is looking for some Psionically Gifted mercenaries.
Rumor has it that Cytech is looking for some Psionically Gifted mercenaries.
I heard the same thing, do you suppose they're looking for us?
I heard the same thing, they probably want us to do some dirty work for them or they would not have used the word "mercenary".
Yes, they are likely looking for our crew, with our psionic equipment for a task.
Yes, they are likely looking for our crew, with our psionic equipment for a task. You shouldn't be so picky about the title you work under.
Well, if they are offering any more of the lost Psionic Weaponry I am up for the task.
Well, if they are offering any more of the lost Psionic Weaponry it should be worth it.
I'm glad to hear that. As the Psionic representative on this ship, I will meet with Cytech on Fornax Prime.
I'm glad you think so. As the Psionic representative on this ship, I will meet with Cytech on Fornax Prime.
